str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A lady. Feminine of kurios; Cyria, a Christian woman.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
